 KWayConstrMgr3 (unsigned int numParts)
bool satisfied (const Cell &cell, unsigned int fromPart, unsigned int toPart)

Detailed Description

Multi-Way Constraints Manager (version 3). Mainly to answer question "Is a vertex allowed to move from one partition to another?"

See also:
BiConstrMgr3.

Member Function Documentation

bool KWayConstrMgr3::satisfied ( const Cell &  cell,
unsigned int  fromPart,
unsigned int  toPart 
) [inline]
Returns:
true if move is OK. In the current implement, only need to check the cell area constraint (cell weight). In the future, we may add other constraints such as #terminal on each partition.

References KWayConstrMgrBase::_diff, KWayConstrMgrBase::_lowerBound, KWayConstrMgrBase::_upperBound, Cell::getWeight(), and KWayConstrMgrBase::satisfiedAll().
